techStack.backend: Node.js + Express (Multer for uploads, bcrypt for hashing, jsonwebtoken for JWT)
techStack.database: MongoDB (document-based storage for users, jobs, applications)
techStack.notes: Uses HTTPS in production; JWT tokens for stateless auth; file uploads stored under /uploads and referenced in DB.

faqExamples.q: Why do employers need admin approval to post?
